name: Munchie Simulator
description:
You know those times when you took one too much   big fat bong rip ?

Me neither. This game is purley based on imagination (that's why it's a simulation Kapp) and totally not based on reallife experiences.

Whatsoever, after said event you get up on your feet wondering how you just did that. But you only got one thing on your mind: FOOD. I've been told experienced ones call   this very situation "the munchies". So you start searching your whole apartment for that stuff that keeps you alive.

Controls:                                                                (this version: just walk through doors 4Head)

Walk: WASD

Interact: E

Crouch: Ctrl

I plan to continue working on this game and expanding it: 

Better lighting and interior,   more maps, more food, more fakes, more visuals, more trippy !

This was created during a mini gamejam challenge against a friend :)    

https://dopamine-overdose.itch.io/

original plan: make a game in 1h

real plan: made this game in 10h over the course of one day
